name: Death Chase Clone - Philip Park
description:
Welcome to my clone of Death Chase! 

Press 1 to steer left and 0 to steer right. 
Press SPACE BAR to shoot. 
Press 9 to accelerate and 8 to decelerate. 

Please note that one key difference between this clone and the original game is that unlike the original game (which only has two speeds for the player), this game has 40. Hence, it is highly encouraged to HOLD DOWN 8 or 9 in order to accelerate or decelerate (rather than just pressing 8 and 9 once). Basically, in this clone, accelerating and decelerating is more gradual. You can know if you are going fast if you hear an audio change or if you see the money meter (in the bottom left) go up. 

Enjoy!
